CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Contract Signed stage positioned above or below the Property Viewed stage?
SRP.A: The Contract Signed stage is positioned {below} the Property Viewed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Contract Signed?
VE.A: The value of stage Contract Signed is {111}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Listed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Listed is {394}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Listed, with a value of {394}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Sale Closed, with a value of {54}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed?
SC.A: Decreased by {74} Properties from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Inquiries to stage Property Viewed?
SC.A: Decreased by {68} Properties from stage Initial Inquiries to stage Property Viewed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 220? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Listed} stage has {394}, the {Initial Inquiries} stage has {324}, the {Property Viewed} stage has {256}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 82? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 82 and 290? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Viewed} stage has {256}, the {Negotiation} stage has {185}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {111}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Property Listed to Initial Inquiries, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Listed} to {Initial Inquiries} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, or from stage Initial Inquiries to Property Viewed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Inquiries} to {Property Viewed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Property Listed to Initial Inquiries, from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to stage {Contract Signed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Negotiation} and {Contract Signed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Sale Closed} stages.
